shows.title: Jazz Rock Revolution of the 70s
shows.description: A journey through the explosive 1970s fusion movement where jazz improvisation collided with rock energy, funk rhythms, and electronic experimentation. From Miles Davis' electric breakthrough to the virtuoso fireworks of Mahavishnu Orchestra and Return to Forever.

shows.title: Spatial Minimalism
shows.description: Italian electronic pioneer Roberto Cacciapaglia alongside Terry Riley, Suzanne Ciani, and other minimalist masters exploring the boundaries of ambient soundscapes

shows.title: Japanese Fusion: East Meets West in Sound
shows.description: A sonic journey through Japan's groundbreaking fusion movement of the 1970s and early 80s, where traditional Japanese sensibilities merged with American jazz, funk, and electronic experimentation. Featuring Hiroshi Suzuki, Ryo Kawasaki, Jun Fukamachi, Haruomi Hosono, and other pioneers who created a uniquely Japanese sound that captivated the world.

shows.title: Kosmische Musik: A Journey Through Krautrock
shows.description: An exploration of Germany's revolutionary 1970s rock scene, featuring motorik rhythms, cosmic explorations, and avant-garde experimentation from the pioneers who changed music forever.

shows.title: Duende - The Soul of Flamenco
shows.description: A passionate journey through flamenco music featuring legendary artists Paco de Lucia, Camaron de la Isla, Ketama, and Carlos Heredia. From traditional forms to nuevo flamenco, experience the duende - that inexplicable magic that transforms sound into pure emotion.

shows.title: Black President: The Revolutionary Sound of Fela Kuti
shows.description: A celebration of Fela Anikulapo Kuti, the Nigerian musician who invented Afrobeat and used his music as a weapon against corruption and military dictatorship. This show explores his incredible journey from London jazz student to Africa's most challenging and charismatic performer.

shows.title: Latin Jazz Corner
shows.description: The fiery rhythms of Latin jazz, blending Afro-Cuban percussion with bebop sophistication.

shows.title: Modal Masters
shows.description: A celebration of the golden age of jazz innovation, from bebop pioneers to spiritual jazz explorers.

shows.title: The Genius of Bach
shows.description: A journey through Bach's most profound keyboard works, featuring legendary performances by Glenn Gould and Rosalyn Tureck.

shows.title: Indie in 2000 (Cartesia Edition)
shows.description: Exploring the indie rock explosion at the turn of the millennium with essential tracks from the year 2000.
